HeroSection.subheadlinePart1: Relengo connects you with people nearby to lend and rent outdoor gear, cameras, tools, and more.
HeroSection.subheadlinePart2: Generate Value from your idle assets, and access items with lest cost.
HeroSection.waitlistCountText: Join 1000+ others and get notified when the app is available.
HeroSection.toastSuccess: You're on the list! We'll be in touch soon.

form.appLaunchConsent: I agree that Relengo may store my email address to send me a download link & exclusive launch offer when the app is available. I can revoke my consent at any time.
form.marketingConsent: I would also like to receive updates, tips, and exclusive offers from Relengo (optional).

HowItWorks.subtitle: How it works
HowItWorks.title: Sharing made simple
HowItWorks.description: Three steps to access what you need, or share what you have.

stepsLending.title: List your item
stepsLending.description: Add a title, description, and a few photosâ€”done in minutes.

stepsLending.title: Agree, hand over, get paid
stepsLending.description: Review requests, accept the right one, meet for the handoverâ€”and get paid right away.

stepsLending.title: Get it back & repeat
stepsLending.description: Get your item back when the rental ends, leave a review, and rent it out again.

stepsRenting.title: Find what you need
stepsRenting.description: Browse items from people around you. Cameras, kayaks, power toolsâ€”it's all here.

stepsRenting.title: Connect & exchange
stepsRenting.description: Browse availability, send a booking request, and arrange pickup once accepted.

stepsRenting.title: Use & return
stepsRenting.description: Enjoy your rental, return it when done, and leave a review.

Categories.subtitle: Categories
Categories.title:
Everything you need,
nothing you don't
Categories.description: From weekend adventures to home projectsâ€”find it locally.

list.name: Do It Yourself
list.items: Paint supplies, renovation tools, craft materials

list.name: Sports

list.name: Outdoor Activities

AppPreview.subtitle: The App
AppPreview.title: Warm, simple, and easy to use
AppPreview.description: A clean interface that supports effortless navigation and clarity.

features.title: Make Money off of your Items in minutes
features.description: Take a picture of what you have lying around the house, upload to Relengo, and start generating more money!

features.title: Rent what you need with a few clicks
features.description: Request a rental with two clicks, and get a response within a day or two from the lender.

features.title: Safe & Private
features.description: Your pick-up address is only visible to renters after you have accepted a rental.

Benefits.subtitle: WHY RELENGO
Benefits.title: A better way to access
Benefits.description: Relengo isn't just an appâ€”it's a movement toward smarter, more connected living.

list.title: Save Money
list.description: Why buy something you'll use twice? Rent it for a fraction of the cost.

list.title: Live Sustainably
list.description: Reduce waste and environmental impact by sharing resources in your community.

list.title: Build Community
list.description: Connect with neighbors, share skills, and strengthen local bonds.

list.title: Stay Protected
list.description: Every rental is backed by our protection policy for peace of mind.

Testimonials.subtitle: Early Adopters
Testimonials.title: People are excited
Testimonials.description: Here's what our beta testers are saying about Relengo.

list.name: Sarah Chen
list.quote: I rented a drone for my vacation shoot. Saved hundreds compared to buying one I'd barely use. This is genius!

list.name: Marcus Johnson
list.quote: Borrowed camping gear from a neighbor for my first backpacking trip. Made a friend and had an amazing adventure.

list.name: Elena Rodriguez
list.quote: Why fill my garage with tools I use once a year? Now I rent power tools when I need them. So much space saved!

FinalCTA.toastSuccess: Welcome to the movement! We'll be in touch.
FinalCTA.headline: Be the first to get notified
FinalCTA.description: Join the waitlist for to be the first to get notified when the app is released and benefit from our exclusive early joiners' offers.
FinalCTA.submittedMessage: You're on the list! Check your inbox.

CookieConsent.title: Cookie Settings
CookieConsent.description: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. Some are necessary for the site to function, others help us understand and optimize usage.

CookieSettings.title: Cookie Settings
CookieSettings.subtitle: Manage your cookie preferences here. You can enable or disable different types of cookies below.
CookieSettings.necessaryDesc: Essential for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled.
CookieSettings.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
CookieSettings.marketingDesc: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements.
